alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Glynn, northeastern Brantley and southeastern Wayne Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Cox to 6 miles northwest of Thalmann to near Hickox. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Dock Junction, Thalmann, Everett, Waynesville, Country Club Estates, Atkinson, Mount Pleasant and Boys Estate. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
